lore.paladins.stone_claymore: A long, crude blade of stone, designed only for the purpose of whacking your enemies over the head.
lore.paladins.golden_claymore: A long, gleaming blade of pure gold. Weak, but makes for a good display piece.
lore.paladins.iron_claymore: An standard longsword, standard for knights and more. Good for range.
lore.paladins.diamond_claymore: An incredibly sharp longsword, suit for none but the finest knights. Good for range.
lore.paladins.netherite_claymore: An exceedingly rare longsword, forged from pure netherite.
